name: Le Samouraï
desciption: After professional hitman Jef Costello is seen by witnesses his efforts to provide himself an alibi drive him further into a corner.

name: Out of the Past
desciption: A private eye escapes his past to run a gas station in a small town, but his past catches up with him. Now he must return to the big city world of danger, corruption, double crosses, and duplicitous dames.

name: Crna macka, beli macor
desciption: Matko and his son Zare live on the banks of the Danube river and get by through hustling and basically doing anything to make a living. In order to pay off a business debt Matko agrees to marry off Zare to the sister of a local gangster.

name: Kind Hearts and Coronets
desciption: A distant poor relative of the Duke D'Ascoyne plots to inherit the title by murdering the eight other heirs who stand ahead of him in the line of succession.

name: The Shawshank Redemption
desciption: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

name: The Godfather
desciption: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty in postwar New York City transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant youngest son.

name: Hababam Sinifi
desciption: Lazy, uneducated students share a very close bond. They live together in the dormitory, where they plan their latest pranks. When a new headmaster arrives, the students naturally try to overthrow him. A comic war of nitwits follows.

name: The Dark Knight
desciption: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

name: Schindler's List
desciption: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
desciption: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

name: 12 Angry Men
desciption: The jury in a New York City murder trial is frustrated by a single member whose skeptical caution forces them to more carefully consider the evidence before jumping to a hasty verdict.
stars: Henry Fonda,Lee J. Cobb,Martin Balsam,John Fiedler

name: The Godfather Part II
desciption: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
stars: Al Pacino,Robert De Niro,Robert Duvall,Diane Keaton

name: Pulp Fiction
desciption: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
stars: John Travolta,Uma Thurman,Samuel L. Jackson,Bruce Willis

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
desciption: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

name: Fight Club
desciption: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

name: Forrest Gump
desciption: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
desciption: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

name: Jai Bhim
desciption: When a tribal man is arrested for a case of alleged theft, his wife turns to a human-rights lawyer to help bring justice.

name: 777 Charlie
desciption: Dharma is stuck in a rut with his negative and lonely lifestyle and spends each day in the comfort of his loneliness. A pup named Charlie enters his life and gives him a new perspective towards it.

name: Rocketry: The Nambi Effect
desciption: Based on the life of Indian Space Research Organization scientist Nambi Narayanan, who was framed for being a spy and arrested in 1994. Though free, he continues to fight for justice against the officials who falsely implicated him.

name: GoodFellas
desciption: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
stars: Robert De Niro,Ray Liotta,Joe Pesci,Lorraine Bracco

name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
desciption: In the Fall of 1963, a Korean War veteran and criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients against the tyrannical nurse.

name: The Kashmir Files
desciption: A heart-wrenching tale that captures the pain, suffering, and struggle of the Kashmiri Pandit community in 1990 and leads Krishna, a young college student, to set out on a quest to uncover the truth.

name: Soorarai Pottru
desciption: Nedumaaran Rajangam "Maara" sets out to make the common man fly and in the process takes on the world's most capital intensive industry and several enemies who stand in his way.

name: Interstellar
desciption: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

name: Se7en
desciption: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
stars: Morgan Freeman,Brad Pitt,Kevin Spacey,Andrew Kevin Walker

name: The Silence of the Lambs
desciption: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
stars: Jodie Foster,Anthony Hopkins,Lawrence A. Bonney,Kasi Lemmons

name: The Green Mile
desciption: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
stars: Tom Hanks,Michael Clarke Duncan,David Morse,Bonnie Hunt

name: Saving Private Ryan
desciption: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

name: Cidade de Deus
desciption: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

name: La vita è bella
desciption: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

name: Shichinin no samurai
desciption: Farmers from a village exploited by bandits hire a veteran samurai for protection, who gathers six other samurai to join him.

name: It's a Wonderful Life
desciption: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

name: Seppuku
desciption: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

name: Sita Ramam
desciption: An orphan soldier, Lieutenant Ram's life changes, after he gets a letter from a girl named Sita. He meets her and love blossoms between them. When he comes back to his camp in Kashmir,After he gets caught in jail, he sends a letter to Sita which won't reach her.

name: Gladiator
desciption: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

name: Whiplash
desciption: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

name: Gisaengchung
desciption: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

name: The Departed
desciption: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

name: Casablanca
desciption: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

name: The Prestige
desciption: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians in 1890s London engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

name: Apocalypse Now
desciption: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

name: Léon
desciption: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by Léon, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered. An unusual relationship forms as she becomes his protégée and learns the assassin's trade.

name: The Pianist
desciption: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

name: The Lion King
desciption: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
stars: Matthew Broderick,Jeremy Irons,James Earl Jones,Whoopi Goldberg

name: The Usual Suspects
desciption: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

name: American History X
desciption: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

name: The Intouchables
desciption: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.
stars: François Cluzet,Omar Sy,Anne Le Ny,Audrey Fleurot

name: Hotaru no haka
desciption: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

name: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
desciption: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

name: Modern Times
desciption: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

name: City Lights
desciption: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.
Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

name: Avengers: Endgame
desciption: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War (2018), the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more in order to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
stars: Robert Downey Jr.,Chris Evans,Mark Ruffalo,Chris Hemsworth

name: 小丑
desciption: The rise of Arthur Fleck, from aspiring stand-up comedian and pariah to Gotham's clown prince and leader of the revolution.
stars: Joaquin Phoenix,Robert De Niro,Zazie Beetz,Frances Conroy

name: American Beauty
desciption: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

name: Django Unchained
desciption: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

name: Kimi no na wa.
desciption: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

name: The Shining
desciption: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

name: Oldeuboi
desciption: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

name: Idi i smotri
desciption: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

name: The Dark Knight Rises
desciption: Eight years after the Joker's reign of chaos, Batman is coerced out of exile with the assistance of the mysterious Selina Kyle in order to defend Gotham City from the vicious guerrilla terrorist Bane.

name: Braveheart
desciption: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

name: Amadeus
desciption: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was deeply jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.
stars: F. Murray Abraham,Tom Hulce,Elizabeth Berridge,Roy Dotrice

name: The Lives of Others
desciption: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

name: 3 Idiots
desciption: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

name: Capharnaüm
desciption: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.
stars: Zain Al Rafeea,Yordanos Shiferaw,Boluwatife Treasure Bankole,Kawsar Al Haddad

name: Das Boot
desciption: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

name: Sunset Blvd.
desciption: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.
stars: William Holden,Gloria Swanson,Erich von Stroheim,Nancy Olson

name: Witness for the Prosecution
desciption: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

name: Paths of Glory
desciption: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

name: The Great Dictator
desciption: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

name: Tengoku to jigoku
desciption: An executive of a Yokohama shoe company becomes a victim of extortion when his chauffeur's son is kidnapped by mistake and held for ransom.

name: Sardar Udham
desciption: A biopic detailing the 2 decades that Punjabi Sikh revolutionary Udham Singh spent planning the assassination of the man responsible for the Jallianwala Bagh massacre.

name: Dil Bechara
desciption: The emotional journey of two hopelessly-in-love youngsters; a young girl, Kizie, who is suffering from cancer; and Manny, a boy Kizie meets at a support group.
stars: Sushant Singh Rajput,Sanjana Sanghi,Sahil Vaid,Saswata Chatterjee

name: Asuran
desciption: The teenage son of a farmer from an underprivileged caste kills a rich, upper caste landlord. Will the farmer, a loving father and a pacifist by heart, be able to save his hot-blooded son is the rest of the story.

name: Drishyam 2
desciption: A gripping tale of an investigation and a family which is threatened by it. Will Georgekutty be able to protect his family this time?

name: Top Gun: Maverick
desciption: After thirty years, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator, but must confront ghosts of his past when he leads TOP GUN's elite graduates on a mission that demands the ultimate sacrifice from those chosen to fly it.

name: Good Will Hunting
desciption: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.

name: Inglourious Basterds
desciption: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

name: Heat
desciption: A group of high-end professional thieves start to feel the heat from the LAPD when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist.
stars: Al Pacino,Robert De Niro,Val Kilmer,Jon Voight

name: Requiem for a Dream
desciption: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

name: Scarface
desciption: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.
stars: Al Pacino,Michelle Pfeiffer,Steven Bauer,Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio

name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
desciption: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories for ever.
stars: Jim Carrey,Kate Winslet,Tom Wilkinson,Gerry Robert Byrne

name: Once Upon a Time in America
desciption: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
stars: Robert De Niro,James Woods,Elizabeth McGovern,Treat Williams

name: Jagten
desciption: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.
stars: Mads Mikkelsen,Thomas Bo Larsen,Annika Wedderkopp,Lasse Fogelstrøm

name: Hamilton
desciption: The real life of one of America's foremost founding fathers and first Secretary of the Treasury, Alexander Hamilton. Captured live on Broadway from the Richard Rodgers Theater with the original Broadway cast.
stars: Lin-Manuel Miranda,Phillipa Soo,Leslie Odom Jr.,Renée Elise Goldsberry

name: Full Metal Jacket
desciption: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.
stars: Matthew Modine,R. Lee Ermey,Vincent D'Onofrio,Adam Baldwin

name: Up
desciption: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

name: Lawrence of Arabia
desciption: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

name: Incendies
desciption: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

name: The Sting
desciption: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

name: Citizen Kane
desciption: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance: 'Rosebud.'

name: To Kill a Mockingbird
desciption: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a Black man against an undeserved rape charge, and tries to educate his young children against prejudice.

name: Metropolis
desciption: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working-class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

name: Jodaeiye Nader az Simin
desciption: A married couple are faced with a difficult decision - to improve the life of their child by moving to another country or to stay in Iran and look after a deteriorating parent who has Alzheimer's disease.

name: Kantara
desciption: When greed paves the way for betrayal, scheming and murder, a young tribal reluctantly dons the traditions of his ancestors to seek justice.
stars: Rishab Shetty,Kishore Kumar G.,Achyuth Kumar,Sapthami Gowda

name: Ikiru
desciption: A bureaucrat tries to find meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

name: The Apartment
desciption: A Manhattan insurance clerk tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

name: Dangal
desciption: Former wrestler Mahavir Singh Phogat and his two wrestler daughters struggle towards glory at the Commonwealth Games in the face of societal oppression.
stars: Aamir Khan,Sakshi Tanwar,Fatima Sana Shaikh,Sanya Malhotra

name: Judgment at Nuremberg
desciption: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

name: Taare Zameen Par
desciption: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

name: Double Indemnity
desciption: A Los Angeles insurance representative lets an alluring housewife seduce him into a scheme of insurance fraud and murder that arouses the suspicion of his colleague, an insurance investigator.
stars: Fred MacMurray,Barbara Stanwyck,Edward G. Robinson,Byron Barr

name: K.G.F: Chapter 2
desciption: In the blood-soaked Kolar Gold Fields, Rocky's name strikes fear into his foes. While his allies look up to him, the government sees him as a threat to law and order. Rocky must battle threats from all sides for unchallenged supremacy.

name: Sen to Chihiro no kamikakushi
desciption: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches and spirits, a world where humans are changed into beasts.

name: It's a Wonderful Life
desciption: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

name: The Lion King
desciption: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
stars: Matthew Broderick,Jeremy Irons,James Earl Jones,Whoopi Goldberg

name: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
desciption: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

name: Coco
desciption: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.
stars: Anthony Gonzalez,Gael García Bernal,Benjamin Bratt,Alanna Ubach

name: WALL·E
desciption: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

name: Toy Story
desciption: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.

name: Up
desciption: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

name: Toy Story 3
desciption: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center instead of the attic right before Andy leaves for college, and it's up to Woody to convince the other toys that they weren't abandoned and to return home.

name: Taare Zameen Par
desciption: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

name: The Kid
desciption: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put their relationship in jeopardy.

name: Hauru no ugoku shiro
desciption: When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

name: Finding Nemo
desciption: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.

name: Klaus
desciption: A simple act of kindness always sparks another, even in a frozen, faraway place. When Smeerensburg's new postman, Jesper, befriends toymaker Klaus, their gifts melt an age-old feud and deliver a sleigh full of holiday traditions.

name: Bacheha-Ye aseman
desciption: After a boy loses his sister's pair of shoes, he goes on a series of adventures in order to find them. When he can't, he tries a new way to "win" a new pair.
stars: Mohammad Amir Naji,Amir Farrokh Hashemian,Bahare Seddiqi,Nafise Jafar-Mohammadi

name: Babam ve Oglum
desciption: The family of a left-wing journalist is torn apart after the military coup of Turkey in 1980.

name: The Sound of Music
desciption: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
desciption: Harry, Ron, and Hermione search for Voldemort's remaining Horcruxes in their effort to destroy the Dark Lord as the final battle rages on at Hogwarts.

name: Ratatouille
desciption: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous Paris restaurant.

name: The Wizard of Oz
desciption: Young Dorothy Gale and her dog Toto are swept away by a tornado from their Kansas farm to the magical Land of Oz, and embark on a quest with three new friends to see the Wizard, who can return her to her home and fulfill the others' wishes.
directors: Victor Fleming,George Cukor,Mervyn LeRoy,Norman Taurog,Richard Thorpe,King Vidor

name: Inside Out
desciption: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life and moved to San Francisco, her emotions - Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness - conflict on how best to navigate a new city, house, and school.

name: How to Train Your Dragon
desciption: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

name: Monsters, Inc.
desciption: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

name: Tonari no Totoro
desciption: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

name: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
desciption: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

name: The Iron Giant
desciption: A young boy befriends a giant robot from outer space that a paranoid government agent wants to destroy.
stars: Eli Marienthal,Harry Connick Jr.,Jennifer Aniston,Vin Diesel

name: Ôkami kodomo no Ame to Yuki
desciption: After her werewolf lover unexpectedly dies in an accident while hunting for food for their children, a young woman must find ways to raise the werewolf son and daughter that she had with him while keeping their trait hidden from society.

name: Chak De! India
desciption: Kabir Khan, the coach of the Indian Women's National Hockey Team, dreams of making his all-girls team emerge victorious against all odds.
stars: Shah Rukh Khan,Vidya Malvade,Sagarika Ghatge,Shilpa Shukla

name: The Circus
desciption: The Tramp finds work and the girl of his dreams at a circus.
stars: Charles Chaplin,Merna Kennedy,Al Ernest Garcia,Harry Crocker

name: The Princess Bride
desciption: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

name: Zootopia
desciption: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together to uncover a conspiracy.

name: The Incredibles
desciption: While trying to lead a quiet suburban life, a family of undercover superheroes are forced into action to save the world.
stars: Craig T. Nelson,Samuel L. Jackson,Holly Hunter,Jason Lee

name: Aladdin
desciption: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

name: Soul
desciption: After landing the gig of a lifetime, a New York jazz pianist suddenly finds himself trapped in a strange land between Earth and the afterlife.

name: Beauty and the Beast
desciption: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

name: Fiddler on the Roof
desciption: In pre-revolutionary Russia, a Jewish peasant with traditional values contends with marrying off three of his daughters with modern romantic ideals while growing anti-Semitic sentiment threatens his village.

name: Tenkû no shiro Rapyuta
desciption: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

name: WolfWalkers
desciption: A young apprentice hunter and her father journey to Ireland to help wipe out the last wolf pack. But everything changes when she befriends a free-spirited girl from a mysterious tribe rumored to transform into wolves by night.

name: Kaguya-hime no monogatari
desciption: Found inside a shining stalk of bamboo by an old bamboo cutter and his wife, a tiny girl grows rapidly into an exquisite young lady. The mysterious young princess enthralls all who encounter her, but ultimately she must confront her fate, the punishment for her crime.
stars: Chloë Grace Moretz,James Caan,Mary Steenburgen,James Marsden

name: Song of the Sea
desciption: Ben, a young Irish boy, and his little sister Saoirse, a girl who can turn into a seal, go on an adventure to free the fairies and save the spirit world.

name: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
desciption: When Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll and he has burned through eight of his nine lives, he launches an epic journey to restore them by finding the mythical Last Wish.

name: The Ten Commandments
desciption: Moses, raised as a prince of Egypt in the Pharaoh's household, learns of his true heritage as a Hebrew and his divine mission as the deliverer of his people from slavery.
stars: Charlton Heston,Yul Brynner,Anne Baxter,Edward G. Robinson

name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
desciption: Harry Potter, Ron and Hermione return to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry for their third year of study, where they delve into the mystery surrounding an escaped prisoner who poses a dangerous threat to the young wizard.

name: Shrek
desciption: A mean lord exiles fairytale creatures to the swamp of a grumpy ogre, who must go on a quest and rescue a princess for the lord in order to get his land back.

name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial
desciption: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.

name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
desciption: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

name: Wonder
desciption: Based on the New York Times bestseller, this movie tells the incredibly inspiring and heartwarming story of August Pullman, a boy with facial differences who enters the fifth grade, attending a mainstream elementary school for the first time.

name: Toy Story 2

name: The Nightmare Before Christmas

name: Togo

name: Veer-Zaara

Thanks to his fractured state of mind and her vivid imagination, the line between fiction and reality blurs as the tale advances.

desciption: Harry Potter finds himself competing in a hazardous tournament between rival schools of magic, but he is distracted by recurring nightmares.

name: Freaks
desciption: A circus' beautiful trapeze artist agrees to marry the leader of side-show performers, but his deformed friends discover she is only marrying him for his inheritance.

name: Bride of Frankenstein
desciption: Mary Shelley reveals the main characters of her novel survived: Dr. Frankenstein, goaded by an even madder scientist, builds his monster a mate.

name: The Innocents
desciption: A young governess for two children becomes convinced that the house and grounds are haunted.

name: Get Out
desciption: A young African-American visits his White girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception of him eventually reaches a boiling point.

name: Evil Dead II
desciption: The lone survivor of an onslaught of flesh-possessing spirits holes up in a cabin with a group of strangers while the demons continue their attack.

name: Halloween
desciption: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.
stars: Donald Pleasence,Jamie Lee Curtis,Tony Moran,Nancy Kyes

name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers
desciption: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

name: American Psycho
desciption: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

name: The Birds

name: Saw

name: Busanhaeng
desciption: While a zombie virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

name: The Others
desciption: A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.

name: The Fly
desciption: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

desciption: Viago, Deacon, and Vladislav are vampires who are struggling with the mundane aspects of modern life, like paying rent, keeping up with the chore wheel, trying to get into nightclubs, and overcoming flatmate conflicts.

name: La piel que habito

name: Repulsion
desciption: A sex-repulsed woman who disapproves of her sister's boyfriend sinks into depression and has horrific visions of rape and violence.

name: Kamera o tomeru na!

name: Les yeux sans visage
desciption: A surgeon causes an accident which leaves his daughter disfigured and goes to extreme lengths to give her a new face.

name: The Invisible Man

name: Vampire Hunter D: Bloodlust

name: The Conjuring
desciption: Paranormal investigators Ed and Lorraine Warren work to help a family terrorized by a dark presence in their farmhouse.

name: A Quiet Place
desciption: In a post-apocalyptic world, a family is forced to live in silence while hiding from monsters with ultra-sensitive hearing.

name: 28 Days Later...
desciption: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.

name: The Crow - Die Krähe
desciption: A man brutally murdered comes back to life as an undead avenger of his and his fiancée's murder.

name: Interview with the Vampire: The Vampire Chronicles
desciption: A vampire tells his epic life story: love, betrayal, loneliness, and hunger.

name: An American Werewolf in London

name: The Wicker Man

name: The Omen

name: Profondo rosso

name: Stree

name: The Evil Dead

name: Dracula

name: Carrie

name: [Rec]
desciption: A television reporter and cameraman follow emergency workers into a dark apartment building and are quickly locked inside with something terrifying.

name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers

name: Dracula
desciption: Transylvanian vampire Count Dracula bends a naive real estate agent to his will, then takes up residence at a London estate where he sleeps in his coffin by day and searches for potential victims by night.

desciption: A woman brings her family back to her childhood home, which used to be an orphanage for handicapped children. Before long, her son starts to communicate with an invisible new friend.

name: Hausu

name: Immortal Beloved
desciption: The life and death of the legendary Ludwig van Beethoven. Besides all the work he is known for, the composer once wrote a famous love letter to a nameless beloved, and the movie tries to ...                See full summary »
stars: Gary Oldman,Jeroen Krabbé,Isabella Rossellini,Johanna ter Steege

Two high school sweethearts meet at a reunion after 22 years and reminisce about their past.

name: Before Midnight

name: Låt den rätte komma in

name: Charade
desciption: Romance and suspense ensue in Paris as a woman is pursued by several men who want a fortune her murdered husband had stolen. Whom can she trust?

name: Trois couleurs: Bleu
desciption: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

name: The Artist

name: Notorious

desciption: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be stopped by a teenager, his gang of biker friends and a group of psychics.

name: Dog Day Afternoon
desciption: Three amateur bank robbers plan to hold up a bank. A nice simple robbery: Walk in, take the money, and run. Unfortunately, the supposedly uncomplicated heist suddenly becomes a bizarre nightmare as everything that could go wrong does.

name: JFK
desciption: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

name: Saving Private Ryan
desciption: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

name: La vita è bella
desciption: When an open-minded Jewish waiter and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

name: Casablanca
desciption: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape the Nazis in French Morocco.

name: Apocalypse Now
desciption: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

name: The Pianist
desciption: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

name: Hotaru no haka
desciption: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

name: Idi i smotri
desciption: After finding an old rifle, a young boy joins the Soviet resistance movement against ruthless German forces and experiences the horrors of World War II.

name: Braveheart
desciption: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.

name: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
desciption: An insane American general orders a bombing attack on the Soviet Union, triggering a path to nuclear holocaust that a war room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
stars: Peter Sellers,George C. Scott,Sterling Hayden,Keenan Wynn

name: Das Boot
desciption: A German U-boat stalks the frigid waters of the North Atlantic as its young crew experience the sheer terror and claustrophobic life of a submariner in World War II.

name: Paths of Glory
desciption: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

name: The Great Dictator
desciption: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

name: Inglourious Basterds
desciption: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

name: Full Metal Jacket
desciption: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.
stars: Matthew Modine,R. Lee Ermey,Vincent D'Onofrio,Adam Baldwin

name: Lawrence of Arabia
desciption: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

name: Judgment at Nuremberg
desciption: In 1948, an American court in occupied Germany tries four Nazis judged for war crimes.

name: Shershaah
desciption: Shershaah is the story of PVC awardee Indian soldier Capt. Vikram Batra, whose bravery and unflinching courage in chasing the Pakistani soldiers out of Indian territory contributed immensely in India finally winning the Kargil War in 1999.

name: Ayla: The Daughter of War
desciption: In 1950, amidst the ravages of the Korean War, Sergeant Süleyman stumbles upon a half-frozen little girl with no parents, and no help in sight. Frantic, scared and on the verge of death, ...                See full summary »

April 6th, 1917. As an infantry battalion assembles to wage war deep in enemy territory, two soldiers are assigned to race against time and deliver a message that will stop 1,600 men from walking straight into a deadly trap.

name: Pan's Labyrinth
desciption: In the Falangist Spain of 1944, the bookish young stepdaughter of a sadistic army officer escapes into an eerie but captivating fantasy world.

name: Gone with the Wind
desciption: American motion picture classic in which a manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

name: Der Untergang
desciption: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.
stars: Bruno Ganz,Alexandra Maria Lara,Ulrich Matthes,Juliane Köhler

name: The Great Escape
desciption: Allied prisoners of war plan for several hundred of their number to escape from a German camp during World War II.

name: Ran
desciption: In Medieval Japan, an elderly warlord retires, handing over his empire to his three sons. However, he vastly underestimates how the new-found power will corrupt them and cause them to turn on each other...and him.

name: To Be or Not to Be
desciption: During the Nazi occupation of Poland, an acting troupe becomes embroiled in a Polish soldier's efforts to track down a German spy.

name: Uri: The Surgical Strike
desciption: Indian army special forces execute a covert operation, avenging the killing of fellow army men at their base by a terrorist group.

name: Dag II
desciption: In a desolate war zone where screams of the innocent echo, seven Maroon Berets will dance with death on the very line between disaster and valor.

name: Hacksaw Ridge
desciption: World War II American Army Medic Desmond T. Doss, who served during the Battle of Okinawa, refuses to kill people and becomes the first man in American history to receive the Medal of Honor without firing a shot.

name: The Deer Hunter
desciption: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of several friends in a small steel mill town in Pennsylvania.
stars: Robert De Niro,Christopher Walken,John Cazale,John Savage

name: Platoon
desciption: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

name: Barry Lyndon
desciption: An Irish rogue wins the heart of a rich widow and assumes her dead husband's aristocratic position in 18th-century England.

name: All Quiet on the Western Front
desciption: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.

name: The Bridge on the River Kwai
desciption: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors in occupied Burma, not knowing that the allied forces are planning a daring commando raid through the jungle to destroy it.

name: Hotel Rwanda
desciption: Paul Rusesabagina, a hotel manager, houses over a thousand Tutsi refugees during their struggle against the Hutu militia in Rwanda, Africa.

name: The Best Years of Our Lives
desciption: Three World War II veterans, two of them traumatized or disabled, return home to the American midwest to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

name: The Message
desciption: This epic historical drama chronicles the life and times of Prophet Muhammad and serves as an introduction to early Islamic history.

name: The General
desciption: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines.

name: Underground
desciption: A group of Serbian socialists prepares for the war in a surreal underground filled by parties, tragedies, love, and hate.

name: La battaglia di Algeri
desciption: In the 1950s, fear and violence escalate as the people of Algiers fight for independence from the French government.

name: Mandariinid
desciption: In 1992, war rages in Abkhazia, a breakaway region of Georgia. An Estonian man Ivo has decided to stay behind and harvest his crops of tangerines. In a bloody conflict at his door, a wounded man is left behind, and Ivo takes him in.

name: La Grande Illusion
desciption: During WWI, two French soldiers are captured and imprisoned in a German P.O.W. camp. Several escape attempts follow until they are eventually sent to a seemingly inescapable fortress.
stars: Jean Gabin,Dita Parlo,Pierre Fresnay,Erich von Stroheim

name: Dara iz Jasenovca
desciption: Follows the story of a young girl named Dara who is sent to a concentration camp in Croatia during World War 2.

name: The Imitation Game
desciption: During World War II, the English mathematical genius Alan Turing tries to crack the German Enigma code with help from fellow mathematicians while attempting to come to terms with his troubled private life.

name: Ip Man
desciption: During the Japanese invasion of China, a wealthy martial artist is forced to leave his home when his city is occupied. With little means of providing for themselves, Ip Man and the remaining members of the city must find a way to survive.

name: Persepolis
desciption: A precocious and outspoken Iranian girl grows up during the Islamic Revolution.

name: Stalag 17
desciption: After two Americans are killed while escaping from a German P.O.W. camp in World War II, the barracks black marketeer, J.J. Sefton, is suspected of being an informer.

name: Quo vadis, Aida?
desciption: Aida is a translator for the UN in the small town of Srebrenica. When the Serbian army takes over the town, her family is among the thousands of citizens looking for shelter in the UN camp.

name: Au revoir les enfants
desciption: A French boarding school run by priests seems to be a haven from World War II until a new student arrives. Occupying the next bed in the dormitory to the top student in his class, the two young boys begin to form a bond.
stars: Gaspard Manesse,Raphael Fejtö,Francine Racette,Stanislas Carré de Malberg

name: Ivanovo detstvo
desciption: During WWII, Soviet orphan Ivan Bondarev strikes up a friendship with three sympathetic Soviet officers while working as a scout behind the German lines.

name: Taegukgi hwinalrimyeo
desciption: When two brothers are forced to fight in the Korean War, the elder decides to take the riskiest missions if it will help shield the younger from battle.

name: Roma città aperta
desciption: During the Nazi occupation of Rome in 1944, the Resistance leader, Giorgio Manfredi, is chased by the Nazis as he seeks refuge and a way to escape.

name: Nefes: Vatan Sagolsun
desciption: Story of 40-man Turkish task force who must defend a relay station.
stars: Mete Horozoglu,Ilker Kizmaz,Baris Bagci,Özgür Eren Koç

name: Jojo Rabbit
desciption: A young German boy in the Hitler Youth whose hero and imaginary friend is the country's dictator is shocked to discover that his mother is hiding a Jewish girl in their home.
stars: Roman Griffin Davis,Thomasin McKenzie,Scarlett Johansson,Taika Waititi

name: Spartacus
desciption: The slave Spartacus survives brutal training as a gladiator and leads a violent revolt against the decadent Roman Republic, as the ambitious Crassus seeks to gain power by crushing the uprising.

name: Doctor Zhivago
desciption: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

name: Letters from Iwo Jima
desciption: The story of the battle of Iwo Jima between the United States and Imperial Japan during World War II, as told from the perspective of the Japanese who fought it.

name: Patton
desciption: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.
stars: George C. Scott,Karl Malden,Stephen Young,Michael Strong

name: Kagemusha
desciption: A petty thief with an utter resemblance to a samurai warlord is hired as the lord's double. When the warlord later dies the thief is forced to take up arms in his place.

name: Bronenosets Potemkin
desciption: In the midst of the Russian Revolution of 1905, the crew of the battleship Potemkin mutiny against the brutal, tyrannical regime of the vessel's officers. The resulting street demonstration in Odessa brings on a police massacre.

name: No Man's Land
desciption: Bosnia and Herzegovina during 1993 at the time of the heaviest fighting between the two warring sides. Two soldiers from opposing sides in the conflict, Nino and Ciki, become trapped in no man's land, whilst a third soldier becomes a living booby trap.

name: Im Westen nichts Neues
desciption: A young German soldier's terrifying experiences and distress on the western front during World War I.

name: Atonement
desciption: Thirteen-year-old fledgling writer Briony Tallis irrevocably changes the course of several lives when she accuses her older sister's lover of a crime he did not commit.

name: Dunkirk
desciption: Allied soldiers from Belgium, the British Commonwealth and Empire, and France are surrounded by the German Army and evacuated during a fierce battle in World War II.

name: Glory
desciption: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union Army, and the Confederates.

name: The Killing Fields
desciption: A journalist is trapped in Cambodia during tyrant Pol Pot's bloody 'Year Zero' cleansing campaign, which claimed the lives of two million 'undesirable' civilians.
stars: Sam Waterston,Haing S. Ngor,John Malkovich,Julian Sands

name: To Have and Have Not
desciption: During World War II, American expatriate Harry Morgan helps transport a French Resistance leader and his beautiful wife to Martinique while romancing a sensuous lounge singer.

name: The Man Who Would Be King
desciption: Two former British soldiers in 1880s India decide to set themselves up as Kings in Kafiristan, a land where no white man has set foot since Alexander the Great.

name: Under sandet
desciption: In post-World War II Denmark, a group of young German POWs are forced to clear a beach of thousands of land mines under the watch of a Danish Sergeant who slowly learns to appreciate their plight.
stars: Roland Møller,Louis Hofmann,Joel Basman,Mikkel Boe Følsgaard

name: The Last of the Mohicans
desciption: Three trappers protect the daughters of a British Colonel in the midst of the French and Indian War.

name: Black Hawk Down
desciption: The story of 160 elite U.S. soldiers who dropped into Mogadishu in October 1993 to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord, but found themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily armed Somalis.

name: Empire of the Sun
desciption: A young English boy struggles to survive under Japanese occupation of China during World War II.

name: The Boy in the Striped Pajamas
desciption: Through the innocent eyes of Bruno, the eight-year-old son of the commandant at a German concentration camp, a forbidden friendship with a Jewish boy on the other side of the camp fence has startling and unexpected consequences.
stars: Asa Butterfield,David Thewlis,Rupert Friend,Zac Mattoon O'Brien

name: The African Queen
desciption: In WWI East Africa, a gin-swilling Canadian riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced English missionary to undertake a trip up a treacherous river and use his boat to attack a German gunship.

name: Kaze tachinu
desciption: A look at the life of Jiro Horikoshi, the man who designed Japanese fighter planes during World War II.

name: The Longest Day
desciption: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.
directors: Ken Annakin,Andrew Marton,Gerd Oswald,Bernhard Wicki,Darryl F. Zanuck

name: The Dirty Dozen
desciption: During World War II, a rebellious U.S. Army Major is assigned a dozen convicted murderers to train and lead them into a mass assassination mission of German officers.

name: Beasts of No Nation
desciption: A drama based on the experiences of Agu, a child soldier fighting in the civil war of an unnamed African country.

name: Zwartboek
desciption: In the Nazi-occupied Netherlands during World War II, a Jewish singer infiltrates the regional Gestapo headquarters for the Dutch resistance.
stars: Carice van Houten,Sebastian Koch,Thom Hoffman,Halina Reijn

name: Zulu
desciption: Outnumbered British soldiers do battle with Zulu warriors at Rorke's Drift.

name: The Caine Mutiny
desciption: When a U.S. Naval captain shows signs of mental instability that jeopardizes the ship, the first officer relieves him of command and faces court martial for mutiny.

name: Gongdong gyeongbi guyeok JSA
desciption: After a shooting incident at the North/South Korean border/DMZ leaves 2 North Korean soldiers dead, a neutral Swiss/Swedish team investigates, what actually happened.

name: The Breadwinner
desciption: In 2001, Afghanistan is under the control of the Taliban. When her father is captured, a determined young girl disguises herself as a boy in order to provide for her family.

name: Love and Death
desciption: In czarist Russia, a neurotic soldier and his distant cousin formulate a plot to assassinate Napoleon.

name: Joyeux Noël
desciption: In December 1914, an unofficial Christmas truce on the Western Front allows soldiers from opposing sides of the First World War to gain insight into each other's way of life.

name: The Thin Red Line
desciption: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

name: Bridge of Spies
desciption: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

name: Mulan
desciption: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

name: Where Eagles Dare
desciption: Allied agents stage a daring raid on a castle where the Nazis are holding American brigadier general George Carnaby prisoner, but that's not all that's really going on.

name: Kelly's Heroes
desciption: A group of U.S. soldiers sneaks across enemy lines to get their hands on a secret stash of Nazi treasure.

name: Gettysburg
desciption: In 1863, the Northern and Southern forces fight at Gettysburg in the decisive battle of the American Civil War.

name: From Here to Eternity
desciption: At a U.S. Army base in 1941 Hawaii, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his commanding officer's wife and top aide begin a tentative affair.

name: Un long dimanche de fiançailles
desciption: Tells the story of a young woman's relentless search for her fiancé, who has disappeared from the trenches of the Somme during World War One.

name: Giù la testa
desciption: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

name: Lifeboat
desciption: Several survivors of a torpedoed merchant ship in World War II find themselves in the same lifeboat with one of the crew members of the U-boat that sank their ship.

name: Bloody Sunday
desciption: A dramatization of the Irish civil rights protest march and subsequent massacre by British troops on January 30, 1972.

name: Sophie Scholl - Die letzten Tage
desciption: A dramatization of the final days of Sophie Scholl, one of the most famous members of the German World War II anti-Nazi resistance movement, The White Rose.

name: Fury
desciption: A grizzled tank commander makes tough decisions as he and his crew fight their way across Germany in April, 1945.

name: The Hurt Locker
desciption: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

name: Legends of the Fall
desciption: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

name: Lone Survivor
desciption: Marcus Luttrell and his team set out on a mission to capture or kill notorious Taliban leader Ahmad Shah, in late June 2005. Marcus and his team are left to fight for their lives in one of the most valiant efforts of modern warfare.

name: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
desciption: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
stars: Clint Eastwood,Eli Wallach,Lee Van Cleef,Aldo Giuffrè

name: Once Upon a Time in the West
desciption: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

name: Django Unchained
desciption: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation owner in Mississippi.

name: Unforgiven
desciption: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."

name: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre
desciption: Two down-on-their-luck Americans searching for work in 1920s Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.

name: Per qualche dollaro in più
desciption: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down an escaped Mexican outlaw.
stars: Clint Eastwood,Lee Van Cleef,Gian Maria Volontè,Mara Krupp

name: The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
desciption: A senator returns to a Western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

name: The Gold Rush
desciption: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

name: Sholay
desciption: After his family is murdered by a notorious and ruthless bandit, a former police officer enlists the services of two outlaws to capture the bandit.

name: Dances with Wolves
desciption: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, finds himself engaging with a neighbouring Sioux settlement, causing him to question his own purpose.
stars: Kevin Costner,Mary McDonnell,Graham Greene,Rodney A. Grant

name: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
desciption: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.

name: The Revenant
desciption: A frontiersman on a fur trading expedition in the 1820s fights for survival after being mauled by a bear and left for dead by members of his own hunting team.

name: Rio Bravo
desciption: A small-town sheriff in the American West enlists the help of a disabled man, a drunk, and a young gunfighter in his efforts to hold in jail the brother of the local bad guy.

name: High Noon
desciption: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at "high noon" when the gang leader, an outlaw he "sent up" years ago, arrives on the noon train.

name: The Searchers
desciption: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a years-long journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches after the rest of his brother's family is massacred in a raid on their Texas farm.

name: Per un pugno di dollari
desciption: A wandering gunfighter plays two rival families against each other in a town torn apart by greed, pride, and revenge.
stars: Clint Eastwood,Gian Maria Volontè,Marianne Koch,Wolfgang Lukschy

name: The Wild Bunch
desciption: An aging group of outlaws look for one last big score as the "traditional" American West is disappearing around them.

name: Tombstone
desciption: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.

name: The Hateful Eight
desciption: In the dead of a Wyoming winter, a bounty hunter and his prisoner find shelter in a cabin currently inhabited by a collection of nefarious characters.
stars: Samuel L. Jackson,Kurt Russell,Jennifer Jason Leigh,Walton Goggins

name: The Outlaw Josey Wales
desciption: Missouri farmer Josey Wales joins a Confederate guerrilla unit and winds up on the run from the Union soldiers who murdered his family.
stars: Clint Eastwood,Sondra Locke,Chief Dan George,Bill McKinney

name: Stagecoach
desciption: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

name: Red River
desciption: Dunson leads a cattle drive, the culmination of over 14 years of work, to its destination in Missouri. But his tyrannical behavior along the way causes a mutiny, led by his adopted son.

name: Wind River
desciption: A veteran hunter helps an FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman on a Wyoming Native American reservation.

name: Blazing Saddles
desciption: In order to ruin a western town, a corrupt politician appoints a black Sheriff, who promptly becomes his most formidable adversary.

name: The Magnificent Seven
desciption: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

name: 3:10 to Yuma
desciption: A small-time rancher agrees to hold a captured outlaw who's awaiting a train to go to court in Yuma. A battle of wills ensues as the outlaw tries to psych out the rancher.

name: Hell or High Water
desciption: A divorced father and his ex-con older brother resort to a desperate scheme in order to save their family's ranch in West Texas.

name: True Grit
desciption: A stubborn teenager enlists the help of a tough U.S. Marshal to track down her father's murderer.

name: The Shootist
desciption: A dying gunfighter spends his last days looking for a way to die with a minimum of pain and a maximum of dignity.

name: Giant
desciption: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.

name: Shane
desciption: A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.
stars: Alan Ladd,Jean Arthur,Van Heflin,Brandon De Wilde

name: Jeremiah Johnson
desciption: A mountain man who wishes to live the life of a hermit becomes the unwilling object of a long vendetta by the Crow tribe and proves to be a match for their warriors in single combat on the early frontier.

name: Giù la testa
desciption: A low-life bandit and an I.R.A. explosives expert rebel against the government and become heroes of the Mexican Revolution.

name: McCabe & Mrs. Miller
desciption: A gambler and a prostitute become business partners in a remote Old West mining town, and their enterprise thrives until a large corporation arrives on the scene.

name: Legends of the Fall
desciption: In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.

name: The Assassination of Jesse James by the Coward Robert Ford
desciption: Robert Ford, who's idolized Jesse James since childhood, tries hard to join the reforming gang of the Missouri outlaw, but gradually becomes resentful of the bandit leader.

name: El Dorado
desciption: Cole Thornton, a gunfighter for hire, joins forces with an old friend, Sheriff J.P. Hara. Together with an old Indian fighter and a gambler, they help a rancher and his family fight a rival rancher that is trying to steal their water.

name: Of Mice and Men
desciption: A nomadic farm worker looks after his dimwitted, gentle-giant friend during the Great Depression.

name: Dead Man
desciption: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

name: Little Big Man
desciption: Jack Crabb, looking back from extreme old age, tells of his life being raised by Native Americans and fighting with General Custer.
stars: Dustin Hoffman,Faye Dunaway,Chief Dan George,Martin Balsam

name: Back to the Future Part III
desciption: Stranded in 1955, Marty McFly learns about the death of Doc Brown in 1885 and must travel back in time to save him. With no fuel readily available for the DeLorean, the two must figure how to escape the Old West before Emmett is murdered.
stars: Michael J. Fox,Christopher Lloyd,Mary Steenburgen,Tom Wilson

name: High Plains Drifter
desciption: A gun-fighting stranger comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

name: True Grit
desciption: A drunken, hard-nosed U.S. Marshal and a Texas Ranger help a stubborn teenager track down her father's murderer in Indian Territory.

name: Open Range
desciption: A former gunslinger is forced to take up arms again when he and his cattle crew are threatened by a corrupt lawman.

name: Lone Star
desciption: When the skeleton of his murdered predecessor is found, Sheriff Sam Deeds unearths many other long-buried secrets in his Texas border town.
stars: Chris Cooper,Elizabeth Peña,Stephen Mendillo,Stephen J. Lang

name: Yahsi Bati
desciption: In 1881, two Ottoman Secret Agents travel to the USA, at the Sultan's request, to deliver a valuable diamond as a gift for the President.

name: The Ballad of Buster Scruggs
desciption: Six tales of life and violence in the Old West, following a singing gunslinger, a bank robber, a traveling impresario, an elderly prospector, a wagon train, and a perverse pair of bounty hunters.
stars: Tim Blake Nelson,Willie Watson,Clancy Brown,Danny McCarthy

name: Pale Rider
desciption: A mysterious preacher (Clint Eastwood) protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

name: Seven Brides for Seven Brothers
desciption: In 1850 Oregon, when a backwoodsman brings a wife home to his farm, his six brothers decide that they want to get married too.

name: Il mio nome è Nessuno
desciption: A young, easy-going gunman worships and competes with a famed gunfighter, insisting that he must face down a gang of 150 outlaws before he can retire.

name: Bacurau
desciption: After the death of her grandmother, Teresa comes home to her matriarchal village in a near-future Brazil to find a succession of sinister events that mobilizes all of its residents.

name: The Proposition
desciption: A lawman apprehends a notorious outlaw and gives him nine days to kill his older brother, or else they'll execute his younger brother.

name: The Three Burials of Melquiades Estrada
desciption: Ranch foreman Pete Perkins looks to fulfill the promise to his recently deceased best friend by burying him in his hometown in Mexico.
stars: Tommy Lee Jones,Barry Pepper,Dwight Yoakam,January Jones

name: Rango
desciption: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

name: Silverado
desciption: A misfit bunch of friends comes together to right the injustices which exist in a small town.

name: Hostiles
desciption: In 1892, a legendary Army Captain reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous territory.

name: Old Henry
desciption: An action western about a farmer who takes in an injured man with a satchel of cash. When a posse comes for the money, he must decide who to trust. Defending a siege, he reveals a gunslinging talent calling his true identity into question.
stars: Tim Blake Nelson,Scott Haze,Gavin Lewis,Trace Adkins

name: Spirit: Stallion of the Cimarron
desciption: A wild stallion is captured by humans and slowly loses the will to resist training, yet, throughout his struggles for freedom, the stallion refuses to let go of the hope of one day returning home to his herd.

name: Django
desciption: A coffin-dragging gunslinger and a prostitute become embroiled in a bitter feud between a Klan of Southern racists and a band of Mexican Revolutionaries.

name: El Topo
desciption: A mysterious black-clad gunfighter wanders a mystical Western landscape encountering multiple bizarre characters.

name: Joheunnom nabbeunnom isanghannom
desciption: The story of two outlaws and a bounty hunter in 1940s Manchuria and their rivalry to possess a treasure map while being pursued by the Japanese army and Chinese bandits.

name: Bone Tomahawk
desciption: In the dying days of the old west, an elderly sheriff and his posse set out to rescue their town's doctor from cannibalistic cave dwellers.

name: Desperado
desciption: Former musician and gunslinger El Mariachi arrives at a small Mexican border town after being away for a long time. His past quickly catches up with him and he soon gets entangled with the local drug kingpin Bucho and his gang.
stars: Antonio Banderas,Salma Hayek,Joaquim de Almeida,Cheech Marin

name: Brimstone
desciption: From the moment the new Reverend climbs the pulpit, Liz knows that she and her family are in great danger.
stars: Guy Pearce,Dakota Fanning,Emilia Jones,Carice van Houten

name: Maverick
desciption: Bret Maverick, needing money for a poker tournament, faces various comic mishaps and challenges, including a charming woman thief.

name: The Longest Ride
desciption: The lives of a young couple intertwine with a much older man, as he reflects back on a past love.

name: The Dressmaker
desciption: A glamorous woman returns to her small town in rural Australia. With her sewing machine and haute couture style, she transforms the women and exacts sweet revenge on those who did her wrong.

name: Two Mules for Sister Sara
desciption: Nun Sara (Shirley MacLaine) is on the run in Mexico and is saved from cowboys by Hogan (Clint Eastwood), who is preparing for a future mission to capture a French fort. The pair become good friends, but Sara never does tell him the true reason behind her being outlawed.

name: Hang 'Em High
desciption: When an innocent man barely survives a lynching, he returns as a lawman determined to bring the vigilantes to justice.

name: Westworld
desciption: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

name: Les frères Sisters
desciption: Eli and Charlie Sisters, an infamous duo of gunslinging assassins, chase a gold prospector and his unexpected ally in 1850s Oregon.
stars: John C. Reilly,Joaquin Phoenix,Jake Gyllenhaal,Riz Ahmed

name: Ravenous
desciption: In a remote military outpost in the 19th century, Captain John Boyd and his regiment embark on a rescue mission which takes a dark turn when they are ambushed by a sadistic cannibal.

name: Free State of Jones
desciption: A disillusioned Confederate army deserter returns to Mississippi and leads a militia of fellow deserters and women in an uprising against the corrupt local Confederate government.

name: Bubba Ho-Tep
desciption: Elvis Presley and a black "JFK" stay in a nursing home where nothing happens - until a wayward Egyptian mummy comes and sucks out the old people's souls thru their anuses. The two decide to fight back.

name: Slow West
desciption: A young Scottish man travels across America in pursuit of the woman he loves, attracting the attention of an outlaw who is willing to serve as a guide.

name: The Magnificent Seven
desciption: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

name: The Power of the Dog
desciption: Charismatic rancher Phil Burbank inspires fear and awe in those around him. When his brother brings home a new wife and her son, Phil torments them until he finds himself exposed to the possibility of love.

name: The Mask of Zorro
desciption: A young thief seeking revenge for his brother's death is trained by the once-great, aging Zorro, who is pursuing his own vengeance.
stars: Antonio Banderas,Anthony Hopkins,Catherine Zeta-Jones,José María de Tavira

name: News of the World
desciption: A Civil War veteran agrees to deliver a girl taken by the Kiowa people years ago to her aunt and uncle against her will. They travel hundreds of miles and face grave dangers as they search for a place that either can call home.

name: City Slickers
desciption: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

name: Young Guns
desciption: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor. But when Billy takes their authority too far, they become the hunted.
stars: Emilio Estevez,Kiefer Sutherland,Lou Diamond Phillips,Charlie Sheen

name: Let Him Go
desciption: A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.

name: Wyatt Earp
desciption: From Wichita to Dodge City, to the O.K. Corral in Tombstone, a man becomes a myth in this thrilling journey of romance, adventure, and desperate heroic action.

name: The Devil's Rejects
desciption: The murderous, backwoods Firefly family take to the road to escape the vengeful Sheriff Wydell, who is not afraid of being as ruthless as his target.
stars: Sid Haig,Sheri Moon Zombie,Bill Moseley,William Forsythe

name: The Horse Whisperer
desciption: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.
stars: Robert Redford,Kristin Scott Thomas,Sam Neill,Dianne Wiest

name: The Salvation
desciption: In 1870s America, the fury of a notorious gang leader is unleashed when a peaceful American settler avenges the death of his family. Then as his cowardly fellow townspeople betray him, he is forced to hunt down the outlaws alone.
stars: Mads Mikkelsen,Eva Green,Jeffrey Dean Morgan,Eric Cantona

name: Appaloosa
desciption: Two friends hired to police a small town that is suffering under the rule of a rancher find their job complicated by the arrival of a young widow.

name: Hidalgo
desciption: In 1890, a down-and-out cowboy and his horse travel to Arabia to compete in a deadly cross desert horse race.

name: The Harder They Fall
desciption: When an outlaw discovers his enemy is being released from prison, he reunites his gang to seek revenge.

name: Far and Away
desciption: A young Irish couple flee to the States, but subsequently struggle to obtain land and prosper freely.

name: Australia
desciption: Set in northern Australia before WWII, an Englishwoman who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscapes.

name: Shanghai Noon
desciption: A Chinese man travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped Princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

name: The Homesman
desciption: Three women who have been driven mad by pioneer life are to be transported across the country by covered wagon by the pious, independent-minded Mary Bee Cuddy, who in turn employs low-life drifter George Briggs to assist her.
stars: Tommy Lee Jones,Hilary Swank,Grace Gummer,Miranda Otto

name: Outland
desciption: A federal marshal stationed at a mining colony on the Jupiter moon of Io uncovers a drug-smuggling conspiracy. He gets no help from the workers or authorities when he finds himself marked for murder.

name: Seraphim Falls
desciption: After the end of the American Civil War, a former Confederate colonel hunts down a former Yankee officer with whom he has a grudge.

name: The Quick and the Dead
desciption: A female gunfighter returns to a frontier town where a dueling tournament is being held, which she enters in an effort to avenge her father's death.

name: Three Amigos!
desciption: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

name: The Missing
desciption: In 1885 New Mexico, a frontier medicine woman forms an uneasy alliance with her estranged father when her daughter is kidnapped by an Apache brujo.
stars: Tommy Lee Jones,Cate Blanchett,Evan Rachel Wood,Jenna Boyd

name: Young Guns II
desciption: In 1881, cattle baron John Chisum pays a bounty to Patrick Floyd Garrett to kill outlaw Billy the Kid.
stars: Emilio Estevez,Kiefer Sutherland,Lou Diamond Phillips,Christian Slater

name: An American Tail: Fievel Goes West
desciption: Fievel's family decides to move out to the West, unaware that they are falling into a trap perpetrated by a smooth-talking cat.
